programme.title: Perot, Buchanan and Dole
programme.short_synopsis: The battle for the Republican presidential candidacy.
programme.medium_synopsis: Ross Perot and Pat Buchanan's challenge to Bob Dole in the race for the Republican presidential nomination and how a thief in the night may yet undo Bill Clinton.
